DOC.brief_summary: Randomized , double-blind , parallel group , multicenter study subject Stage 1 2 essential hypertension target blood pressure ( < 140/90mmHg ) Baseline . Subjects randomize receive either carvedilol CR + lisinopril lisinopril + placebo . Subjects uptitrated 6 week period target blood pressure ( < 140/90mmHg ) met . The primary objective study compare proportion subject achieve target blood pressure 6 week treatment .
DOC.brief_title: Research Study To Test Carvedilol CR + Lisinopril Versus Lisinopril + Placebo In Patients With High Blood Pressure
DOC.criteria: Male female age 1880 year ; stage 1 2 hypertension currently receive 0 1 antihypertensive medication ; mean sit systolic blood pressure > /=140mmHg < /=170mmHg , mean sit diastolic blood pressure > /=90 < /=105mmHg . Subjects take one hypertensive medication medication withdrawn enter washout phase prior randomization . Subject take two antihypertensive medication , know contraindication angiotensinconverting enzyme ( ACE ) inhibitor alpha betablocker therapy , subject Type 1 Type 2 diabetes
